altTitles.th: ดาบคลั่งทวงแค้น

description.en:
When the Wischtech threatened to invade the fiefs of Szaalanden, the Emperor dispatched fourteen youths. Of these, the Seven Heroes halted the invasion to herald a time of prosperity while the four Lances of Betrayal were supposedly defeated.   
Two decades later, the Lances of Betrayal have reappeared and formed a bandit militia near the frontier fief Gormbark. A man with a black sword and a scar over his left eye slays an entire troop of that militia. He is identified as the boy, Köinzell, and becomes as much an object of fear as of hope even as his own past, motivations, and purpose are a mystery to those he meets on his journey.
___
[Alt Official English](https://yenpress.com/series/ubel-blatt)
description.pl:
Dwadzieścia lat temu, w czasie wojny z tajemniczym państwem Wischtech, wysłano czternastu bohaterów z misją mającą zagwarantować ich ojczyźnie bezpieczeństwo.. Trzech zginęło w drodze, czterech zdradziło, siedmiu wykonało powierzoną im misję i wróciło w blasku chwały… Za swe zasługi otrzymali władzę, większą, niż byli sobie w stanie wyobrazić.  
  
Krążą jednak plotki. Głoszą, że na pograniczu, pod władzą czterech zdrajców, tworzą się nowe oddziały i że przybędzie nowy bohater. A wszystko wskazuje na to, że jest nim niepozorny, półelfi chłopiec…
description.pt-br: Existe um conto imperial, que no ano 3968 - quando o Império do Szaalenden ainda estava em guerra com um inimigo poderoso chamado Wischtech - o Imperador enviou 14 jovens para parar a matança. Entretanto, não foram todos que completaram a jornada, durante ela 3 morreram e 4 traíram seus companheiros. Os Sete Heróis que sobraram, detiveram e derrotaram os traidores e completaram a missão impedindo a invasão do exército inimigo ao império. Os sete homens então retornaram e foram recebidos como salvadores, ganhando o título de "Os Sete Heróis", enquanto o nome dos traidores foi para sempre manchados com o título de "As Lanças da Traição". Esta história, porém, pode ser simplesmente uma fábula. Os "Sete Heróis", na verdade, foram covardes, que, após ver o poder do inimigo fugiram. Enquanto corriam de volta para casa, foram os "Lanças da Traição" aqueles que de fato bravamente continuaram e completaram a missão. Entretanto, estes mesmo após completarem a missão, na volta para casa, foram encurralados e assassinados pelos desertores covardes que dessa forma tiraram a honra e glória daqueles que completaram a tarefa. Sem saber deste grupo traidor, um deles sobreviveu. Seu nome era Ascheriit, e enquanto ele esperava a morte, sua vida fora salva ao consumir o corpo de uma Fada. Agora, vinte anos se passaram desde a guerra. Ascheriit, após renascer, tomando o nome de Köinzell, retorna ao império para saciar sua vingança contra aqueles que traíram ele e seus amigos. Ao mesmo tempo, lá vem uma palavra de profecia, proclamando que um herói virá da fronteira para impedir uma misteriosa, mortal catástrofe.

description.en: On one rainy day, high school girl Komae Shouko learns that her classmate, Katagiri Sui, has a special ability.

Tengoku, a school nurse, and Aoki, a high school teacher.
They have been lovers for a few months, and have been experiencing infatuation, jealousy, and little by little, they've begun to embody what it means to be in a "relationship".

One day, Aoki receives a phone call from a friend. He tells his friend that he has no intention of marrying his current lover. Tengoku, who was standing beside him, overhears him.

The next day is his day off, but he is about to leave early.
Aoki feels uncomfortable and decides to walk to the station to see them off. They kiss each other on an out-of-the-way street, but
Aoki is seen by a passerby and unintentionally mutters, "This is the worst". Aoki's expression changes and he leaves the scene alone.

Their relationship seemed to be going well, but...

Kikka Tsumugu (28 years old) lives alone on the 2nd floor of an apartment building. Kikka, who works as a wasai (traditional Japanese clothing manufacturer) at home, is a job given by Mashimo, her ex-boyfriend from high school. One day Kikka was selected to be a board member of the apartment complex lives at and met with a man named Hirara...!? Mashimo lives 200 meters away from Kikka's house and Hirara lives 200m above. The vertical and horizontal romance triangle has begun!

title.en: The Dragon Cubs Arrive! Mommy is a Dragon

altTitles.en: The Dragon Cub Is Coming! Mommy Is Fierce And Spicy

altTitles.vi: Lóng Zǎi Lái Xí! Mā Mī Hěn Yòu Là

description.en: Five years ago, she left an egg and said, "This is the son I gave birth to you. When he grows up, that will be my return date." A few months later, the son broke out of the shell, with two shiny eggs on his head. Xiao Longjiao, she hadn't returned at te date. She disappeared for five years, and he went crazy for five years, until the little dragon cub brought back a woman... But the little dragon cub said, "Dad, she saved me, and I want to commit myself to her!" Infighting.

altTitles.th: ตั๋วโกงชีวิต

description.en:
Lee Kyung Ho's mind was engulfed with ending his life due to bullying and the loss of his mother. He attempts to, but is saved. His determination to commit suicide somehow entices Sierra, a grim reaper who later offers him a contract. This contract blesses him with the ability to borrow the powers of the dead in their previous life in return of sacrificing years from his lifespan. For the sake of attaining what he wishes for, he eventually agrees to it.

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Naver](https://comic.naver.com/webtoon/list?titleId=730656)

---
**Official Translations:** [Chinese (Traditional Characters) / 漢語](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/fantasy/theboyofdeath/list?title_no=1771),  [Indonesian / Bahasa](https://www.webtoons.com/id/action/ticket-hero/list?title_no=2195)
description.fr:
L'esprit de Lee Kyung Ho était complètement bouleversé à l'idée de mettre fin à ses jours à cause du harcèlement et de la perte de sa mère. Il essaie, mais il est sauvé. Sa détermination à se suicider séduit Sierra, une faucheuse sinistre qui lui offre plus tard un pacte. Ce pacte lui permet d'emprunter les pouvoirs des morts dans leur vie antérieure en échange de plusieurs années sacrifiées de sa vie. Afin d'atteindre ce qu'il souhaite, il finit par l'accepter.  
  
- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/fantasy/theboyofdeath/list?title_no=1771)
description.ru: Ли Кён Хо был поглощен идеей суицида, из-за издевательств в школе и гибели его матери. Очередная попытка, но спасен. Его решимость покончить с собой каким-то образом соблазняет Сиеру, мрачного жнеца, который позже предлагает ему контракт. Этот контракт даёт возможность заимствовать способности и силы мертвых из их предыдущей жизни, в обмен на силу, он должен жертвовать годами, которые ему остались на этой земле. Ради достижения того, чего он желает, он всё таки соглашается на сделку.
description.es-la: Lee Kyung Ho queria terminar su vida debido al acoso y la pérdida de su madre. Intenta hacerlo, pero no lo consigue. Su determinación de suicidarse de alguna manera fracasa, una persona llega y le ofrece un contrato. Este contrato lo bendice con la capacidad de tomar prestados los poderes de los muertos en su vida anterior a cambio de sacrificar años de su vida. Para lograr lo que desea y el acepta el trato.

description.en:
Tatsuya Uesugi, the older brother who has no relationship with the word "hard work," and Kazuya Uesugi, the younger brother who tries his hardest in everything he does. 

They are twin brothers. They have known Minami Asakura, the only daughter of the neighboring coffee shop "Minamikaze" since childhood. You can't take your eyes off the "youth" of these three...!


---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media (2008)

---
- **Won the 28th Shogakukan Manga Award for Shonen**

altTitles.ja: ラブリー・ランナーズ・ハイ

description.en: Keiichi and Miharu are childhood friends and were in the same track club. Miharu, although an elementary school student, is already on par with junior high students and aims to compete all across the country. Keiichi can do nothing but watch from afar...
Minjae finds Jinhyuk, the breathtakingly handsome and personable new employee, very likable. After Minjae gets drunk during a company dinner, Jinhyuk helps Minjae solve a little problem he has…

title.en: Cutie's Here: Mommy, Where's My Daddy?

altTitles.zh: 萌宝来袭：妈咪我爹地呢？

description.en: The female lead, Ye Xiange, used to be a trainee within Linshan Entertainment. Before she could officially debut however, she was plagued by scandals and her nudes were all over the media. The company terminated the contract with her and she was also cheated by her boyfriend. What she didn’t expect most was that she suddenly had a five year old son after waking up. What the hell? Child, who’s your mommy? And who’s your daddy?

Taiki Inomata is on the boys' badminton team at sports powerhouse Eimei Junior and Senior High. He's in love with basketball player Chinatsu Kano, the older girl he trains alongside every morning in the gym. One Spring day, their relationship takes a sharp turn ... And thus begins this brand-new series of love, sports and youth!

---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media (2023)
description.fr: Taiki Inomata, membre du club de badminton, a eu le coup de foudre pour Chinatsu Kano, la star du club de basket de son établissement. Il s'entraîne à ses côtés tous les matins. Sa relation avec Chinatsu va prendre un tournant totalement inédit lorsqu'un jour de printemps, une nouvelle des plus déconcertantes va lui offrir une opportunité inespérée de conquérir sa belle.
description.uk:
Тайкі Іномата — учасник команди з бадмінтону, який вчиться у школі Еймей. Щодня він намагається прийти до школи якомога раніше, але його завжди випереджає Чінацу Кано, в яку він закоханий.

Чінацу — зірка команди з баскетболу. Хоч Тайкі добре грає в бадмінтон, він далеко не настільки популярний, як Чінацу, що робить шанси на взаємну симпатію низькими. Але за дивним поворотом долі Чінацу починає жити в його будинку.
description.vi:
Taiki Inomata, năm ba sơ trung, là thành viên của đội cầu lông. Kể từ khi tập luyện cùng với đội cầu lông, cậu luôn cố đến sớm nhất có thể, thế nhưng, cậu chỉ là người thứ hai đến nhà đa năng. Bởi vì người đầu tiên luôn đến sớm nhất, chính là Chinatsu Kano, năm nhất cao trung, và là người mà cậu thích.

Vì sự chênh lệch giữa mức độ nổi tiếng mà cậu cảm thấy mình không thể kéo gần khoảng cách với cô ấy. Thế nhưng...

Vào một ngày đẹp trời, vì chuyện gia đình, Chinatsu Kano đã đến sống chung với Taiki Inomata.

Với cơ hội ngàn năm có một này, với cái flag romcom to hơn núi Phú Sĩ này, liệu rằng cậu chàng Taiki có thể làm nên chuyện hay không?
description.es-la: Taiki Inomata forma parte del equipo masculino de bádminton en el prestigioso instituto deportivo Eimei Junior y Senior High. Su corazón late por Chinatsu Kano, la hábil jugadora de baloncesto con la que comparte entrenamientos matutinos en el gimnasio. En un día primaveral, su relación da un giro sorprendente… Y así se inicia esta nueva serie que combina amor, deportes y la efervescencia de la juventud.
description.pt-br: Taiki Inomata está na equipe de Badminton dos meninos na Powerhouse Esportiva Eimei Junior e Senior High. Ele está apaixonado por jogador de basquete Chinatsu Kano, a menina mais velha que ele treina ao lado de todas as manhãs no ginásio. Um dia de primavera, seu relacionamento tem uma virada acentuada ... e assim começa esta nova série de amor, esportes e jovens!

title.en: I Only Want to Beat You

altTitles.en: I Want to Beat You, Oh Roji
I Want to Defeat You, Oh Roji

description.en: The male lead 'Lee Gigo', who has never lost a single time in his life, and the female lead who defeated him 'Oh Roji'. Who will end up as the victor of this 'bet'?
description.uk: Головний герой Лі Ґіґо, який жодного разу в житті не програв, і головна героїня, яка перемогла його, О Роджі. Хто в підсумку стане переможцем в цьому «парі»?

description.en: A romance story set in the Meiji era. Born into a prestigious family and blessed with good looks, Satoko is said to have a short life expectancy. But suddenly, her life is targeted by a mysterious killer...?! In order to survive on the spot, Satoko makes a "proposal" for the killer...?! - A young lady and an assassin... A contract marriage love suspense between two people who should never meet!
description.es:
Una joven y un asesino a sueldo... ¡un thriller de amor sobre un matrimonio contractual entre dos personas que nunca deberían cruzarse!
Estamos en la era Meiji.
Nacida en el seno de una familia prominente y bendecida con una buena apariencia, a Satoko le dicen que le queda poco tiempo de vida, y su único sueño es casarse en beneficio de su familia.
¡Pero, de repente, un misterioso asesino atenta contra su vida...!
¡Para sobrevivir, Satoko le hace una proposición al asesino...!
description.ja:
令嬢と殺し屋…絶対交わらないはずの二人の、契約結婚ラブサスペンス！
時は明治。
名家に生まれ美貌に恵まれるも、余命わずかと言われている紗都子の唯一の夢は…家の利益になる結婚をすること。
しかし突然、謎の殺し屋に命を狙われ…！？
その場を生き延びるため、紗都子は殺し屋にある“提案”を…！？
description.uk: "Весілля світлячків" – манґа, події якої розгортаються у давні часи епохи Мейджі. Дівчина на ім'я Сатоко, донька заможної родини, якій пощастило успадкувати красу, прагне одружитися з тим, кого запропонує їй батько, але як же це зробити, якщо її життю загрожує хвороба? Одного дня героїня потрапляє до рук викрадачів, де, задля порятунку себе, вона пропонує шлюб власному вбивці. Куди її приведе узгоджений шлюб з людиною, яку вона ніколи не мала зустріти?
description.es-la:
Una joven y un asesino a sueldo... ¡un thriller de amor sobre un matrimonio contractual entre dos personas que nunca deberían cruzarse!
Estamos en la era Meiji.
Nacida en el seno de una familia prominente y bendecida con una buena apariencia, a Satoko le dicen que le queda poco tiempo de vida, y su único sueño es casarse en beneficio de su familia.
¡Pero, de repente, un misterioso asesino atenta contra su vida...!
¡Para sobrevivir, Satoko le hace una proposición al asesino...!
description.pt-br:
Uma história de romance ambientada na era Meiji.  

Nascida em uma família de prestígio e abençoada com boa aparência, Satoko tem uma expectativa de vida curta. Mas de repente, sua vida é alvo de um misterioso assassino...?! Para sobreviver no local, Satoko faz uma "proposta" para o assassino...?! 
- Uma jovem e um assassino... 

Um suspense de amor por contrato de casamento entre duas pessoas que nunca deveriam se encontrar!
description.zh-hk:
千金小姐與殺手…絕對沒有交集的兩個人間的契約結婚愛情喜劇！
時值明治時代。
出生名門又集美貌於一身，卻被告知餘命不久矣的紗都子唯一的夢想是…為了家族的利益而結婚。
但是，突然之間被謎樣的殺手給襲擊了…！？
為了從這種局面中活下來，紗都子向殺手提出了某項“提案”…！？

description.en:
As the monster slayer troops, also known as 'Sretu', no longer functioned as it used to, humans became monster feed.
'Jin Cheongdo', who has been living in a world full of monsters for his entire life, uses a legendary item 'Midwood', to turn back in time, for the sake of killing 'Ian' who was the centerpiece of this whole mess...
description.ko:
괴물처치부대 '스레투'가 사라진 지금. 인간들은 괴물들의 먹이가 되었다.
괴물이 가득한 세상에서 평생을 살아온 '진청도'는
전설의 아이템 '미드우트'를 이용해 과거로 가서
이 사태를 초래한 '이안'을 죽이려 하는데...

description.en:
The new series from Ken Wakui, the creator of Shinjuku Swan and Tokyo Revengers!

As the battle to decide the next leader of the Yotsurugi gang that runs Asakusa is heating up, a meteorite strike suddenly awakens superpowers in the people of Japan. How will Hibaru Yotsurugi, the son of the previous gang leader, come out of this?!
description.fr: Le nouveau manga de Ken Wakui, le créateur de Shinjuku Swan et Tokyo Revengers ! Alors que la bataille pour désigner le prochain chef du clan Yotsurugi qui dirige Asakusa s'intensifie, la chute d'une météorite réveille soudainement des super-pouvoirs chez les Japonais. Comment Hibaru Yotsurugi, le fils du précédent boss du clan va-t-il s'en sortir ?

altTitles.en: The Blood Star Damned by Heaven

altTitles.pt-br: A Estrela de Sangue Amaldiçoada pelo Céu

description.en: Cheon Yoo-ok is a young orphan who survives by begging, however, as he delves deeper into the mysteries of a sect, dark secrets and unknown threats begin to emerge, in a world where intrigues and conspiracies are everywhere, he will have You have to overcome unimaginable challenges to protect those you love and discover your true destiny.
description.pt-br: Cheon Yoo-ok é um jovem órfão que sobrevive pedindo esmolas, porém, à medida que ele se aprofunda nos mistérios de uma seita, segredos sombrios e ameaças desconhecidas começam a surgir, em um mundo onde intrigas e conspirações estão por toda parte, ele terá que superar desafios inimagináveis para proteger aqueles que ama e descobrir seu verdadeiro destino.

description.en: When school is over, Tsubasa, an elementary schooler, works at her grandfather's bookstore. The books they provide are of a slightly lewd kind, which is just a little bit of trouble for an elementary schooler.

altTitles.fr: Etes-vous Prêts à tout le monde?

altTitles.ja: みなさまエト・ヴ・プレ？

description.en: Chika Kuwabara pretty much drifts through life with no purpose, her days spent at arcades or getting into petty fights. But one day, she witnesses someone practicing fencing in the school gymnasium. That glimpse begins to awaken something deep inside her!

title.en: Sacchan to Ken-chan wa Kyou mo Itteru

altTitles.en: Sacchan and Ken-chan Are Going at it Again

altTitles.ja: さっちゃんとけんちゃんは今日もイってる

description.en: University student Kenta is excited to be going out with the quiet but beautiful Sachiko. Six months into their relationship, a side of Sachiko other than her "ladylike" side becomes apparent. The more you know about her, the more you fall in love with her.
description.ja: 物静かな美人・幸子と付き合うことになり、舞い上がる男子大学生・賢太。 付き合って半年後、明らかになる”おしとやか”だけじゃない彼女の一面に!? 知れば知るほど好きになる、イケメン彼女と乙女な彼氏のイってる系エロコメディ開幕!!

title.en: Dungeon ni Hisomu Yandere na Kanojo ni Ore wa Nando mo Korosareru

altTitles.ja: ダンジョンに潜むヤンデレな彼女に俺は何度も殺される

altTitles.en: My Yandere Girlfriend Lurks in the Dungeon and Kills Me Over and Over Again

altTitles.ru: Моя Девушка-Яндере, Прячущаяся в Подземелье, Убивает Меня Снова и Снова

altTitles.ja-ro: Dungeon ni Hisomu Yandere na Kanojo ni Ore wa Nando mo Korosareru

altTitles.ko: 던전에 숨어든 얀데레 그녀에게 나는 몇 번이고 죽는다

description.en: A fantasy story about Kiska, a boy who is mistreated by the villagers. He manages to survive thanks to his childhood friend Namia, who was the only one by his side. One day, Namia is murdered by three men, and Kiska is accused of the crime and banished to an inescapable class S dungeon. However, he finds himself in a different world where he can use "Save and Reset" to get back on his feet no matter how many times he dies. The story is about Kiska's quest for revenge against those who wronged him and his friend
description.ja:
何度死んだって、何度倒れたって、やり直す――！

冤罪により脱出不可能な高難易度ダンジョンの奥地へ追放された、なんの変哲もない男・キスカ。絶望する間もなく、突然モンスターに殺されるその寸前、＜セーブ＆リセット＞のスキルが付与されて……！？

description.en: The extraordinary Princess Parfait's marvelous fantasy adventure!

altTitles.ja: からかい上手(?)の西片さん

altTitles.tl: Ang Magaling sa Panunuksong (?) si Nishikata-san

description.en: In this spinoff of "Teasing Master Takagi-san", and continuation of "Teasing Master (nee) Takagi-san", Chi Nishikata tries her hardest to tease her classmate Ooshiro, but for some reason it feels like she's met him somewhere. Can she finally get one over on him and remember her past?
description.tl: Si Chi, ang minamahal na anak ng (dating) Takagi at Nishikata. Ngayon ay nasa high school na kasama ang batang lalaki sa tabi, kaya ba n'yang tuksuhin s'ya tulad ng kanyang ina?! O s'ya ba ang matutukso tulad ng kanyang ama!? Ang mga araw na puno ng pang-aasar ay magsisimula na muli— !
description.uk: Це спін-офф манг "Майстер дражнилок Такаґі-сан" та "Майстер дражнилок(колишня) Такаґі-сан". Донька головних героїв Чі іде до школи і зустрічає друга дитинства. Як складуться їх відносини і чи зможе вона подражнити хлопця?
description.pt-br: Neste spin-off de "Karakai Jouzu no Takagi-san" e continuação de "Karakai Jouzu no (Moto) Takagi-san", Nishikata Chi se esforça ao máximo para provocar seu colega de classe Ooshiro, mas por algum motivo parece que ela o conhece de algum lugar. Ela pode finalmente superá-lo e lembrar de seu passado?

description.cs: Lidstvo bylo po stovky let utlačováno kvůli vzestupu a invazi našich přirozených nepřátel "démonů". Světu vládl "Velký král démonů" a jeho 47 "ďábelských vládců". Zatímco lidé žijí ve strachu, 47 lidí bylo vybráno z celého světa a zíkslai titul "Hrdinové" a připravují se na boj proti armádě velkého krále démonů. A nyní začíná plán jak zachránit lidstvo, jehož osud je teď na tenkém ledě.
description.en:
Centuries ago, humanity’s natural enemy, “Demons,” invaded the world and oppressed humankind. The Great Demon Lord and 47 subordinates known as Demon Lords have since dominated the world, while the human race lives on in fear.

In desperation, a last-ditch effort for humanity’s very survival is placed in the hands of 47 people gathered from across the world. These heroes will oppose the demon army and win back humanity’s freedom…or die trying!
description.ja: 天敵“魔族”の台頭と侵攻により、人類が虐げられ続けて数百年。世界は“大魔王”と、その配下である47体の“魔王”により支配されていた。人々は怯えて暮らしながらも、世界中から選び抜かれた47人を“勇者”と名付け、魔王軍に対抗すべく準備を進めていた。そして今、人類の存亡を懸けた決死の作戦が始まろうとしていた―――。
description.ru:
Уже сотни лет человечество вынуждено существовать под гнётом своих естественных врагов — демонов, сумевших захватить мир. В их главе стоит Повелитель тьмы, и в подчинении его находятся сорок семь Королей.
Однако среди людей, чей дух сломлен вековым страхом, было отобрано столько же наречённых Героев, готовых сразиться с демонической армией. И, кажется, отчаянная борьба за судьбу человеческой расы начинается прямо сейчас...
description.pt-br: A humanidade foi oprimida por centenas de anos devido à ascensão e invasão do inimigo natural "demônios". O mundo era governado pelo "Grande Lorde Demônio" e seus 47 "Senhores Demônios". Enquanto as pessoas vivem com medo, 47 pessoas selecionadas de todo o mundo foram nomeadas "Heróis" e estão se preparando para lutar contra o exército do Rei Demônio. E agora, uma operação desesperada com a sobrevivência da humanidade em jogo estava prestes a começar.

altTitles.th: นักรักโลกมายา
หน้ากากแก้ว

description.en:
Chigusa Tsukikage holds the rights to the play "The Crimson Goddess," a lost masterpiece that many would love to see brought back to the stage.  
  
Tsukikage, however, won't allow the cherished work to be diminished by an actress who isn't worthy of playing the title role. Fortunately, she has found two young actresses that just might be worthy: Maya Kitajima and Ayumi Himekawa. Though both actresses are exceptionally talented, only one can win the coveted role.

---
- **Won the Japan Cartoonists Association Award in 1995**

---

Published in Indonesian by Elex Media as **Topeng Kaca**

Ojou Kotone is a first-year high school girl who was having trouble using the ticket machine at the station, Suguru Sewa, a first-year high school boy passing by helped her out, and he surprised as she transferred to Sewa's high school. It's her first time to taking the train, her first trying curry udon, Sewa being her first friend. This is a love comedy of firsts between a young lady and a caring high school boy!
description.ja: 御城琴音は超がつくお嬢様の高校１年生。駅の券売機の使い方が分からず困っているところを通りがかりの高校１年生・瀬和すぐるに助けられたのをきっかけに、瀬和の高校に転校してきた。はじめての電車。はじめてのカレーうどん。はじめての友達。「はじめてを教えて欲しい」お嬢様と世話焼き男子高校生のはじめてラブコメディ！

description.en: Poverty-striken Yang Jinghua dies in an accident. The moment he wakes up, he seems ten years younger. At first, Yang Jinghua thought he was reborn. However a white-haired, rich and handsome man, named Duanmu Xi, reveals the truth. In order to stay in the world, Yang Jinghua must become Duanmu Xi's soul image and therefore, creates a soul contract that binds both their souls.

Despite his athletic gifts, Ayasegawa Jiro is a loner who causes others to lose or give up on their dreams, all because of him. While struggling with his loneliness, he discovers the "Bambies," an uncompetitive baseball team whose motto is "having fun." Jiro finds joy in his baseball life with his teammates, but...This is a baseball youth drama that explores the relationship between a genius and his peers.

Yataro Araki, a member of the Tojo High School soccer team, has big dreams. Within a decade, he sees himself conquering the soccer world’s loftiest peak: European “football!” Fast forward to what may be his last soccer match before graduation, the match that will make or break his dreams. Having thus far failed to attract the attention of scouts, he is now desperate to do whatever it takes to prove himself. Yataro is prepared to get his hands dirty if it means winning. If it means standing at the top! Welcome to the world of international football! Nothing is sacred, no rule is left unbroken! Not when victory is on the line!
description.ja: 東條高校サッカー部に所属する嵐木八咫郎（あらきやたろう）の夢は欧州を制覇し、世界一になること。 高校3年の最後の試合、夢への第1歩、プロ入りを目指しスカウトの目に留まるため奮闘をするが―…。
description.vi: Yataro Araki là thành viên clb bóng đá trường cao trung Tojo. Cậu có ước mơ chinh phục đỉnh cao bóng đá Châu Âu trong 10 năm tới. Thời gian trôi qua, vào trận cuối cùng trước khi tốt nghiệp, và cũng là trận sẽ quyết định giấc mơ của cậu. Mọi thứ sẽ vô nghĩa nếu Araki không được tuyển trạch viên nào để ý đến, vì vậy cậu sẵn lòng làm tất cả mọi thứ, kể cả khi phải chơi bẩn để giành lấy chiến thắng. Nếu nó giúp cậu vươn đến đỉnh cao! Chào mừng đến với giới bóng đá quốc tế! Không tồn tại thứ gọi là bất khả xâm phạm hay luật lệ! Ít nhất là khi chiến thắng đang cận kề!

altTitles.vi: Bắt nạt mình đi mà, nữ phản diện ơi!

altTitles.th: โปรดรังแกฉันทีคุณนางร้าย!

altTitles.zh-ro: Qǐng qīfù wǒ ba, è yì xiǎojiě!

altTitles.ru: Пожалуйста, поиздевайтесь надо мной, мисс Злодейка!

altTitles.pt-br: Por favor, me humilhe, senhorita vilã!

altTitles.ar: !تنمرِ علي من فضلكِ يا أنسة الشر

altTitles.fr: Je vous en supplie madame l'antagoniste, Harcelez moi !

altTitles.ja: いじめてください、悪役令嬢様！

description.en: I, Yvonne, reincarnated into an otome game as the rich villainess. According to the game's plot, a character loathed by everyone such as myself has the main role of bullying the heroine, pushing her towards the various love interests' romantic routes. But it seems like there's something wrong with Elsa, the heroine! She's getting too close to me!
description.es: Yo, Yvonne, reencarné en un juego otome como la villana. Según la trama del juego, un personaje detestado por todos como yo tiene el papel principal de acosar a la heroína, empujándola hacia las rutas románticas de los distintos intereses amorosos. Pero parece que a Elsa, la heroína, le pasa algo. ¡Se está acercando demasiado a mí!
description.fr: Moi, Yvonne, me suis réincarnée en riche prétentieuse dans un jeu otome. Selon l’intrigue du jeu, je suis détestée de tous et j’ai pour rôle d’harceler l’héroïne. Mais il y a quelque chose de bizarre avec Elsa, l’héroïne ! Elle se rapproche trop de moi !
description.id: Aku, Yvonne, bereinkarnasi dalam otome game sebagai penjahat kaya. Menurut plot permainan, karakter yang dibenci oleh semua orang seperti aku memiliki peran utama menindas sang heroin, mendorongnya ke berbagai rute romantis minat cinta. Tapi sepertinya ada yang salah dengan Elsa, sang heroine! Dia terlalu dekat denganku!
description.ru: Я, Ивонна, перевоплотилась в отомэ-игру в роли богатой злодейки. Согласно сюжету игры, у ненавистного всем персонажа, такого как я, главная роль - издеваться над героиней, подталкивая её к романтическим интригам. Но кажется, что с Эльзой, что-то не так! Она становится слишком близка ко мне!
description.zh: 我，伊芳，转生成为了乙女游戏中的恶役千金。 按照恶役文的套路来说，像我这种集万千读者厌恶于一身的角色，主要作用当然是欺负女主角、推进其和攻略角色的恋爱线了。 可是——这个女主爱莎像是有什么大病！ 都、都说了太近了，不要再靠过来了！ 爱莎：“小伊小伊~ 今日份的欺负是什么呢~
description.zh-hk: 我，伊芳，轉生成為了乙女遊戲中的惡役千金。按照惡役文的套路來說，像我這種集萬千讀者厭惡於一身的角色，主要作用當然是欺負女主角、推進其和攻略角色的戀愛線了。可是——這個女主愛莎像是有什麼大病！都、都說了太近了，不要再靠過來了！愛莎：“小伊小伊~ 今日份的欺負是什麼呢~

title.en: Mahouka Koukou no Rettousei - Yotsuba Keishou-hen

altTitles.es-la: Mahouka Koukou no Rettousei - Sucesión Yotsuba

altTitles.en: The Irregular at Magic High School - Yotsuba Succession Arc

altTitles.ru: Непутёвый ученик в школе магии: Наследник семьи Йоцуба

altTitles.ja: 魔法科高校の劣等生 四葉継承編

altTitles.zh: 魔法科高中的劣等生 四叶继承篇

altTitles.zh-hk: 魔法科高中的劣等生 四葉繼承篇

altTitles.ja-ro: Mahō-ka Kōkō no Rettō Nama Yotsuba Keishō-hen

description.en:
In December, Miyuki receives an invitation for the Yotsuba's new year's family gathering. However, unlike previous years, they specially added "Everyone must attend" on the invitation. Miyuki understands that "the time has come" — it is time to decide the next head for the Yotsuba Clan.  
— If she is elected, her brother will be free.  
— If she becomes the next head, she will be forced to marry someone else.  
Miyuki's heart is a mess.  
The truth of the Brother and Sister relationship is finally unveiled!? Yotsuba Keishou-hen begins!  
  
Adaptation of the original novel's volume 16.

altTitles.vi: Vợ ơi, xin hãy ngoan nhé!

description.en:
This is brought to you by the same author of "My Wife Is From a Thousand Years Ago". 

"If you could go back in time, what would you do?"

"I would go to the school entrance and wait for you every day to pursue you shamelessly until you're my girlfriend. What about you?"

"Hmm... I will definitely carefully wait until I'm twenty-four to get to know you again, then gradually fall in love, then get married, and then ask you this question. I live cautiously because I'm afraid that the butterfly effect will make me lose you."
A chaotic 4-panel manga about the daily lives of siblings Ringabelle and Bigbell, who are bells.

altTitles.ja: ラジエーションハウス

description.en: A new milestone in medical drama begins! A medical diagnosis mystery manga depicting the other side of medical care, the radiology department. Iori Igarashi is a talented radiology technician who has patiently waited for his chance to work with An Amakasu, his childhood friend. After being hired at her family's hospital, he is determined to fulfill a promise that he made with An when they were younger. Unfortunately, having been out of touch for years, she doesn't recognize him and it doesn't help that she also isn't a fan of the way he performs his duties. As all sorts of cases come into the department, she must acknowledge his skills and learn to work together so that patients can receive the best treatment possible. While the two of them adapt to each other, will An recognize her childhood friend, who has been working with her all this time?

altTitles.th: คราวนี้ถึงทีต้องแฮปปี้เอนดิ้ง

description.en:
Yeon-Woo's husband died the day they ended their sham marriage. Yeon-Woo, who is swept in sorrow, is given a chance to return 100 days back in time! As she struggles to prevent the death of her husband Seon-Jae, their 'real' marriage has only just begun. This is the story of a late budding romance, faced with danger and a life at stake.  
  
"This time, I will make sure we have a happy ending!"

---
- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/id/romance/happy-ending/list?title_no=2908)
- [Official Thai Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/th/romance/there-must-be-happy-endings/list?title_no=3152)
- [Official German Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/de/romance/there-must-be-happy-endings/list?title_no=3404)
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/METROPOLIS/yidingyaohappyending/list?title_no=1659)
- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/drama/happyending/list?title_no=2830)

altTitles.ja: 帝乃三姉妹は案外、チョロい。

altTitles.zh-hk: 帝乃三姊妹意外的好對付。

altTitles.en: The Mikadono Sisters Are Surprisingly Easy to Deal With.

altTitles.zh: 帝乃三姐妹原来很好搞定

altTitles.id: Kakak beradik Mikadono ternyata sangat mudah ditangani.

description.en: Though Ayase Yuu is the son of a renowned and talented actress, he is below average in anything he does. He is entrusted to live under the care of his mother's friend, and later discovers that he will also be rooming with the three sisters from his school who possess both beauty and talent. Though Yuu thought that an understanding would be impossible to reach between an ordinary person and those blessed with talent, the three sisters are surprisingly...?!
description.id: Meskipun Ayase Yuu adalah putra seorang aktris terkenal dan berbakat, dia berada di bawah rata-rata dalam segala hal yang dia lakukan. Dia dipercaya untuk hidup di bawah asuhan teman ibunya, dan kemudian mengetahui bahwa dia juga akan sekamar dengan tiga saudara perempuan dari sekolahnya yang memiliki kecantikan dan bakat. Meskipun Yuu berpikir bahwa pemahaman tidak mungkin dicapai antara orang biasa dan mereka yang diberkati dengan bakat, ketiga saudara perempuan itu secara mengejutkan...?!
description.ja:
孤高の天才三姉妹と同居することになったちょっとポンコツめな高校生・優。平凡以下な彼が三姉妹に振り回されると思いきや…この三姉妹、案外、チョロい――？

優との生活で変わっていく三姉妹の心模様。才色兼備の三姉妹が動揺、狼狽、そしてときめく…

description.en: Young horror writer “Bambi” (pen name: Kojika Kanoko; gender: male) never believed in the supernatural and therefore had no issue with moving into an apartment where a suicide had taken place. After his serialisation was discontinued, he was asked to start writing a short story based on actual experience. He then noticed a spirit in his apartment, an amnesiac high school girl by the name of “Ako.” Since Ako was a relatively friendly and talkitive spirit, not to mention harmless, with her permission, Bambi used her as a model for his next work. But there’s another “Ako,” Yamashiro Ako, a gloomy high school girl who dreams every night from the spirit’s perspective.

title.en: Match Made in Heaven by Chance

altTitles.en: Match Made in Heaven by Chance
By Chance, a Match Made in Heaven

altTitles.th: โชคชะตานำพารัก

description.en: ‘How long have i been laying down at home…?’ Han Jia, who is turning 32 this year (she’s a freelancer who’s still doesn’t have a full-time job/jobless), suffers because of the pressure given by people around her that keep telling her to get married. Around the same time, Jin Mincheol, her childhood friend who came to Jia’s hometown for holiday, is having the same problem. Then, the two people got married just like that. Now that they have married….. ‘Huh? We match each other more than i thought?’
description.es: Jia Han, una trabajadora independiente sin trabajo de 32 años, está cansada de que sus padres insistan con que se case y se vaya de la casa. Cuando se encuentra con un amigo de la infancia, Mincheol Jin, que siente la misma presión por parte de sus padres, dice sin pensar que casarse sería una buena solución para los problemas de los dos. Pero no se imaginaba que él aceptaría su propuesta y, de repente, se encuentra de camino al altar. ¡Una historia sobre un romance inesperado que no podrás dejar de leer!
description.fr: Jia, 32 ans, sans-emploi, vit toujours avec ses parents. En ayant marre de la pression de sa famille, par un coup de tête, elle fait une demande en mariage à son ami d'enfance, Mincheol, qu'elle vient tout juste de recroiser après des années. À sa grande surprise, celui-ci accepte directement sa proposition et d'un jour à l'autre elle se trouve mariée à Mincheol. Cette union improvisée perturbe Jia, mais, petit à petit elle découvre qu'ils sont en fait... parfaits l'un pour l'autre?!
description.id: Sudah berapa tahun kamu tinggal di rumah orang tua? Han Jiah (pengangguran) yang tahun ini berusia 32 tahun, hari ini juga menderita karena masih belum menikah dan bekerja. Tiba-tiba Jim Minchul, sahabat kecil Jiah muncul dan mereka memutuskan untuk menikah!?? Ternyata mereka berdua malah lebih cocok dari yang diperkirakan?!
description.ko:
집에 얹혀산 지 몇 년 차더라..? 
올해 32살을 맞이한 한지아(일하지 않는 프리랜서/무직)는 주변의 결혼하라는 눈칫밥에 오늘도 고통받는데.. 
때마침 명절을 맞이하여 고향에 내려온 소꿉친구 민철 또한 같은 고민이 있었으니.
그러면 쉬운 해결 방법이 있잖아?!? 그렇게 홧김에 결혼한 두 사람.
그런데 막상 결혼해 보니... 어라?? 생각보다 너무 잘 맞는다?!
description.th: ‘ฮันจีอา’ ฟรีแลนซ์สาววัย 32 ปีที่เบื่อหน่ายกับคำถามเรื่องแต่งงานของพ่อแม่ บังเอิญพบกับเพื่อนสมัยเด็ก ‘จินมินชอล’ หนุ่มเนิร์ดที่โดนคำถามจากพ่อแม่เรื่องนี้เช่นกัน คนโสดทั้งสองตัดสินใจจะหยุดคำถามเหล่านี้ด้วยการแต่งงาน! หรือว่านี่จะเป็นบุพเพสันนิวาส?
description.zh:
厌倦被家人催婚的两人！
就这样稀里糊涂结了婚！
今年32岁的韩智雅没工作，不知在家蹭吃蹭喝了多少年，一直被催婚……正好在过节的时候，智雅遇到了回老家过节的儿时玩伴珉哲。她发现珉哲也有相同的困扰。因此，他们俩一气之下选择结婚……
description.pt-br:
"Há quanto tempo estou deitada em casa...?"

Han Jia, que está completando 32 anos este ano (ela é uma freelancer que ainda não tem um emprego registrado), sofre com a pressão das pessoas ao redor, que ficam dizendo para ela se casar. Na mesma época, Jin Mincheol, seu amigo de infância que veio para a cidade natal de Jia para passar as férias, está tendo o mesmo problema. Então, as duas pessoas se casaram, simples assim. Agora que eles se casaram… 

"Huh? Nós combinamos mais do que pesávamos?"
description.zh-hk: 因為沒工作而一直住在老家的韓智雅總是會被家人催促結婚，就在她瀕臨崩潰的時候，遇到了有相同煩惱的兒時玩伴……

description.en:
Although he never wanted to see him again, S Class Esper Seo Leehyeon ends up meeting Jin Taewoo during his Guide matching test. 
In the past, they were each other's closest friend but their relationship fractured and broke due to a peculiar event. 
In an unexpected and unpleasant reunion, Jin Taewoo becomes Seo Leehyeon's exclusive Guide, due to their high compatibility. This guy, who's acting like he's taking revenge for the past, often gets on his nerves, and an aggressive guiding begins...
<< No matter how many times you reject me, you were meant to end up falling into my clutches. >>
Can the Esper really escape from the Guide's revenge?

altTitles.en: TONIKAWA: Over The Moon For You

description.en:
Described as a story full of "love" and "dreams", Tonikaku Kawaii follows a protagonist whose name is written with the characters for "Hoshizora" ("Starry Sky" in Japanese), but whose name is pronounced as "Nasa". On the day of his high school entrance exams, Nasa encounters a beautiful girl. For Nasa, it feels like destiny is finally calling out to him that he will have a girl friend, but…

Note: Volume 15 and 16's numberings are correct, as this is how they are in the original.
description.ru:
Тяжело жить, если родители дали тебе имя НАСА - да, как NASA, и каждый второй спрашивает, пойдешь ли ты в астронавты. Еще тяжелее, если в один день тебя собьет грузовик, ты встретишь любовь всей своей жизни и тут же ее потеряешь, согласившись жениться на ней. Мужик сказал, что женится - значит женись. И заверьте… Веселая комедия положений без особой логики, но с неожиданными поворотами сюжета. Ведь жена и правда с Луны?..   
  
**Tonikaku Cawaii is the official romanization.**
description.pt-br: Aceito sair com você se você se casar comigo.

description.en:
In order to trace the culprit behind his family’s murder in his childhood, Vampire Hunter Heilo accepts a kill order from a client. 

His target is the head of the Livera Group, Herrace. Heilo joins Herrace’s company, and successfully acquires a position as the personal secretary of Herrace himself, who is known for his dominating presence in politics and the underworld. 

However, Herrace’s special treatment gradually causes Heilo’s heart to sway… 

What will his fate be, having fallen for the man he's supposed to kill?!

altTitles.ja: 上手にできたね、渡瀬さん

description.en:
A second sex, Dom/Sub, emerged in the evolution of mankind. 

Doms dominates Subs and Subs are subordinate to Doms.

Watase, who is a "sub but top," distanced himself from sex from play due to the trauma of being being almost forcibly dominated by his Dom lover in the past.
One day, he quickly went to a shop that specialized in sex toys in order to satisfy his lust.
When he confesses to Touma that he is a submissive top… he gets an unexpected reply, "I'm a dominant bottom”…?!

Millions of years have passed since the times of legends, when the worlds of man and gods were still the same. In these times it was the desires of man that moved the world. It is the era of the 500 year war: The warring states period. Kingdom is the story of a young boy named Shin who grew into a great general and all the trials and bloodshed that lead him there.  

---
  
- **Won the Osamu Tezuka Cultural Grand Prize in 2013**
- **Earned a Guinness World Record on December 12, 2012 for Manga written by the most people. -Note- The record was due to its "Social Kingdom" campaign in which fans and other artists were given the task of redrawing the entire 26th volume.**

As of June 2022, Kingdom has over 90 million copies in circulation, making it one of the currently best-selling manga series of all time. 

Parution: Weekly Young Jump

---

**Officially Translated:**  
- In French by [Meian](https://www.meian-editions.fr/meian/licence/kingdom/1131)  
- In Italian by [J-pop](https://j-pop.it/it/fumetti/manga/kingdom.html)
description.fr:
**Cette Histoire se déroule avant notre ère.**

La chine, qui n'est pas encore unifiée, traverse une grande guerre de cinq siècles. Shin, un jeune garçon contemporain de ces temps violents et houleux, cherche, par la seule force de son épée, à se faire un nom sous les cieux !!!
___
**Kingdom en France, le manga tant attendu ! Véritable phénomène au Japon !**
- Élu meilleur manga au 17e Grand Prix Culturel Osamu Tezuka (2013)
- Meilleur manga seinen vendu au Japon depuis 2015 (source : Oricon)
- 3ème meilleur manga vendu au Japon en 2016 et 2017 (source : Oricon)
description.pt-br: Milhões de anos se passaram desde os tempos de lendas, quando os mundos dos homens e deuses ainda eram os mesmos. Nestes tempos eram os desejos do homem que mudaram o mundo. É o período da guerra de 500 anos: a Era dos Reinos Combatentes. Kingdom é a história de um garoto órfão e pobre tem o sonho de se tornar um grande general e assim começando seu caminho de provações e derramamento de sangue que o levarão até o topo das lendas!

description.en: A child born to become a shaman and disrupt the world. He tries to become an ordinary office worker in order not to give up his greed and receive God.Choi Young-hoon, who sees through fate through contemplation and spurs. Can you really become an ordinary office worker?

Because of his stepfather's gambling debt, Jung Heejae continues to live as a student in the third year of high school, despite having turned twenty. As the threats from the loan sharks become more severe, Heejae ends up escaping to a secluded island in the South, where his grandmother lives. On this island with no internet, Heejae meets a gangster called Cha Beomjoon, and becomes his personal freeze pop errand boy (?)...

description.cs: Mladý Chihiro tráví dny tréninkem pod vedením svého slavného otce kováře. Doufá, že jednoho dne sám stane slavným kovářem mečů. Praštěný otec a vážný syn – mysleli si, že tyto dny budou trvat věčně. Najednou však dojde k tragédii. Temný den plný krve. Chihiro a jeho čepel nyní žijí jen pro pomstu. Epická bitevní akce s katanou!
description.en: Young Chihiro spends his days training under his famous swordsmith father. One day he hopes to become a great sword-maker himself. The goofy father and the serious son--they thought these days would last forever. But suddenly, tragedy strikes. A dark day soaked in blood. Chihiro and his blade now live only for revenge. Epic sword battle action!
description.ru: Юный Тихиро проводит дни, тренируясь под руководством своего знаменитого отца-мечника, который издавна изготавливает катаны для начала и конца войн. Однажды Тихиро надеется сам стать великим мастером мечей. Легкомысленный отец и серьезный сын — они думали, что эти спокойные дни будут длиться вечно. Но внезапно случается трагедия. Темный день, пропитанный кровью. Тихиро и его клинок теперь живут только ради мести...
description.tr: Genç Chihiro günlerini ünlü kılıç ustası babasının yanında eğitim alarak geçirmektedir. Bir gün kendisi de büyük bir kılıç ustası olmayı ummaktadır. Şapşal baba ve ciddi oğul, bugünlerin sonsuza dek süreceğini düşünmektedirler. Ama aniden bir trajedi yaşanır. Kana bulanmış karanlık bir gün. Chihiro ve kılıcı artık sadece intikam için yaşamaktadır. Destansı kılıç savaşı aksiyonu!

description.en: Hajun, who works day and night to pay off his parents' debts, takes libido suppressants (Esikon) and lived a quiet life for a long time. One day when he accidentally forgot to take his medicine, his sexual drive, which had been suppressed for a long time due to side effects, surged...! What the android said to Hajun, whose body is hot and dizzy in front of him, "Master, can I help you?"

Daria is a relatively normal girl, despite the fact that she always seems to be the recipient of miracles. But when a strange character appears suddenly, with the intention of keeping his promise to kill her, her average high school life becomes anything but…

title.en: Yuri ni Hasamaru Otoko wa Shineba Ii?!

altTitles.ja: Yuri ni Hasamaru Otoko wa Shineba Ii?!
百合にはさまる男は死ねばいい！？

altTitles.en: Boys Who Get Between Yuri Are Better Off Dead?!

altTitles.zh: 插足百合的男人不如去死！

altTitles.en: Boys Gilding the Lily Shall Die

description.en: This is a manga about a female brass band member who was proud of playing 1st, when a transfer student who played 1st at a strong school at the national level appears. This manga depicts the unnameable emotions of the members of the girls' brass band.
description.ja: 自分が1stを吹くことに誇りを持っていた女子吹奏楽部員の元に、全国レベルの強豪校で1stを吹いていた転校生が現れてーーな漫画です。女子吹奏楽部員たちの、名前のつけられない感情を描きます。

altTitles.fa: من یک قطعه درجه اسطوره ای بدست آوردم

description.en:
In a world where technology and magic are almost indistinguishable from one another, monsters and creatures of myth and legend reign terror upon mankind. In humanity’s darkest moment, individuals with special god-like powers emerge to save the day. They are — the Awakened.

Meet Jaehyeon, a feeble Awakened human Raider, who struggles to make ends meet until one day a series of confounding events allow him to claim a powerful item that will change the course of history forever…
description.ko:
D급 무투계 레이더,
최강의 귀속 아이템으로
세계를 구할 신의 대적자가 되다!
description.ru: Я получил единственный в мире мифический предмет. Но что? Этот предмет принадлежит мне?
